profile:
Centennial Windows & Doors is a family owned and operated business that offers an end-to-end solution for replacement windows and doors. We sell, manufacture, install, and service our own complete line of award winning, energy efficient windows and doors.
 
Why homeowners choose Centennial Windows & Doors
 
The Best Warranty
- We provide a 100% warranty on everything we do for as long as you own your home – NO fine print and NO exclusions. And if you sell your home, it's transferable to new homeowners within 10 years of purchasing Centennial windows and doors.
 
Responsibility and Accountability
- We take full responsibility to manufacture, install, and service your windows and doors. You are dealing with ONE company only and one phone number. 
 
Proven Installation Quality
- We DO NOT hire subcontractors. All work is performed by our full time, uniformed employees, fully covered under Workers’ Compensation. Centennial Installers were the first in Canada to write the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) Fenestration Installation Technician (FIT) certification exam.
 
Leaders in Energy Efficiency
- Centennial Windows & Doors was the first window company in Canada to be ENERGY STAR® certified. We have been awarded the:
          - 2004 – ENERGY STAR Manufacturer of the Year Award
          - 2005 – ENERGY STAR Retailer of the Year Award
          - 2008 – ENERGY STAR Sustained Excellence Award
          - 2014 – ENERGY STAR Manufacturer of the Year Award – Windows and Doors
- Since 2013, our windows have been recognized as ENERGY STAR Most Efficient.
service_area: We have 13 branch areas across Ontario: Barrie, Brantford, Burlington, Chatham, Kitchener, Listowel, London, Mississauga, Sarnia, Orangeville, Owen Sound, Windsor, Oshawa and every town in between.
products: Custom residential windows and doors. Replacement vinyl windows. Premium steel and fibreglass entry door systems. Vinyl sliding patio doors. 25 standard window colours. 29 standard door colours. 4 door stains. 4 interior window coatings.
services: In-home sales directly to homeowners without the use of subcontractors. Custom window manufacturing. Custom door manufacturing. Replacement window installation. Replacement door installation. Retrofit installation. Full frame tear-out installation. Custom colour matching. In-house, expert Customer Service Technicians.
specialities: Custom window manufacturing. Custom door manufacturing. Replacement window installation. Replacement door installation. In-home sales directly to homeowners without the use of subcontractors. In-house, expert Customer Service Technicians.
payment_method: Cheque, Visa, Mastercard, Financing available with approved credit
memberships: CSA, ENERGY STAR, Fenestration Canada, IGMAC, NFRC, SAWDAC, Home Builders’ Association, BBBs

profile:
Clera Windows + Doors by FM Industries has been manufacturing and installing windows and doors throughout all of Ontario since 1978.  They add beauty and value to nearly 1000 homes every month and can easily service the entire province via one of their 37 sales and installation offices.

 

Clera Windows + Doors has been recognized as one of Canada’s Best 50 Privately Managed Companies and the City of Vaughan’s Company of the Year.  Clera was recently awarded the Houzz service award for 2014 and is a proud recipient of the Homestars Best Award for 2012 and 2013. Add to these achievements a stellar A+ Better Business Bureau rating and you’ll understand why Clera Windows + Doors is the best choice for new windows and doors for your home.

 

We manufacture.  We install.  You save.

Toronto, East York, Stratford, Goderich, Oshawa, Essex County, Pembroke, Ottawa East, Ottawa West, Kitchener, Orangeville, Welland, Barrie, Newmarket, Peterborough, Belleville, Cobourg, Kingston, Brantford, Guelph, Oakville, Mississauga, Kanata, Brockville, Woodstock, London, Cornwall, Burlington, Hamilton
